page.title: 20EVENTS IN TILSTON-THE WAKES
page.content: The{Wakes}is an ancient tradition of the village. It takes place over the August Bank{holiday weekend.}A disco is held to choose the{Wakes Queen.}The Wakes committee choose a{Lord Mayor. On saturday a five a side football competition is held. Late afternoon a{ {Fancy Dress Parade}processes from the Village Green to the Recreation Field led by the{Mayor}and the{Queen}in a horse drawn carriage. 11.00 a.m. on Sunday a{Pram-race}takes place. The competitors race to Farndon and back calling at every pub on the way. The roasting of the ox is begun and continues over night. On Monday afternoon races, speciality acts, stalls, the fair and other activities take place on the Recreation field. The first slice of the ox is auctioned. People come from miles around.
